Text: You should write a book " The unknown history of 80s music " For many of us the 80s simply means Durans and Flocks of Seagals but you sir have shown us how much more there was.
Thank you 80z! I love the music of this era.  Like erikphnx said, you've shown us how much more there was out there. Always appreciate your posts.
Spurge42, thx for the comment. glad you enjoyed these posts!
